channel.title: Lending on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Lending on FinanClub

item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:227 Chances: Analysts think this stock should be worth 30% more. SoFi management expects earnings to grow robustly over several years. Needham has initiated coverage on SoFi Technologies (SOFI) with a Buy rating setting a price target of $10 per share. We view SOFI as a long-term winner in the digital lending/neobank space, largely due to its focus on prime and super-prime consumers and possession of a full banking license, which we believe provides the company superior unit economics compared to other consumer finance platforms that focus on lower income borrowers and/or lack a banking license.

item.title: UPST
item.description: score:-50 Chances: Liberty Savings Bank Selects Upstart for Personal Lending There are seven disruptive stocks that should be on every investor’s radar Upstart and Affirm might bounce back This fintech enterprise certainly has huge upside Risks: Investors are losing confidence in this one-time market darling The Fed’s interest rate hikes flushed a lot of losers out of the market Investors need to dig past the performance of the share price Investors should avoid rushing to buy stocks just for their AI pedigree Score:-50 chances characters count - risks characters count = -50
